suncertify.common

Class PropertiesFileAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.common.PropertiesFileAccess

  • public class PropertiesFileAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used in server and standalone mode to persist to and read from the suncertify.properties file which is located in the current working directory
    Author:
    Robbie Byrne
